sentences.en: The course is made up of 12 two-hour sessions.
sentences.cn: 这门课总共上12次，每次两小时。

sentences.en: Managers at their factory hold a two-hour teleconference with head office every day.
sentences.cn: 他们工厂的经理们每天与总部举行两小时的电话会议。

sentences.en: If you have to cover 12 chapters in American history, begin by planning on three two-hour reviews with four chapters per session.
sentences.cn: 如果你必须涵盖美国史的12个章节，首先计划3次2小时的复习，每次4章。
